author: Vertyco
description: Allow users to create suggestions for your server. With optional anonymity and customization.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store suggestion text, only the user id's who are making the suggestions and voters.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing! Type `[p]help IdeaBoard` to see all commands for this cog.

DOCUMENTATION: https://github.com/vertyco/vrt-cogs/blob/main/ideaboard/README.md
short: Make suggestions and share ideas anonymously.
